game.title: The Lost Relic
game.description: The kingdom's most prized possession, an ancient relic, has been stolen. Your quest is to track down the relic and return it to its rightful place in the Royal Museum.
game.reward: A hefty sum of gold coins

tasks.description: Search for any clues or evidence at the crime scene to help track down the thief.
Interrogate the suspects, who are known criminals with connections to the underground world.
Follow the trail of the thief by gathering information from various sources and tracing their movements.
Track down the thief and confront them to retrieve the stolen relic.
